column3: Proper names of people, including first names, last names, individual or family names, unique nicknames.
Name of a planet or moon.
Name of any place that is not a planet. Often a city or geographical feature.
Names of companies, government agencies, educational institutions, military units.
Derived/adjectival forms of GPE and Location names, as well as adjectival forms of named religions, heritage and political affiliation.
Events with proper names, such as specific wars, battles, or political landmarks.
column4: Day of Red Doves, Battle of the Ladon

column3: Any named armament specific to Red Rising, regardless of size - excludes generic items like ‘weapon,’ ‘cannon,’. etc

column2: Vehicle Proper name of a specific instance of a vehicle, typically capable of space travel.

column3: Official signifiers of ranks, titles, positions, most typically military ranks or other signifiers of status within an organization. Excludes informal/familial titles.
Named instance of a technology specific to Red Rising. Storm God, gravBike
Named profession specific to Red Rising, excluding ranks. Helldiver, Master Maker
Named instace of a holiday or ritual practice, including political and other ceremonies. Forum, Laureltide
